description: Contains specialty amounts of capitation payments, matched to the associated members.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the associated member list for this transaction.

columns.name: MEMBER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the associated member for this transaction.

columns.name: SPEC_CAP_AMT
columns.description: The specialty rate of the associated member in this transaction.
